# Auto-fix lint errors

Execute the **fix** workflow as a **TeamSpec**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_BOOTSTRAP.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_BOOTSTRAP.md)

## Workflow

Auto-Fix Linter Errors:
1. Run linter to identify errors
2. Apply automatic fixes where possible
3. Report manual fixes needed
4. Re-run linter to verify


## Output

Fixed files
